website_summaries.verdict: This advanced LEGO build is challenging but fun to put together, resulting in a functional droid that can be played with or displayed.
pros: A challenging LEGO build resulting in a good-sized BB-8 droid
Head can be turned and moved back and forth thanks to a side-mounted handle
Pop-open side hatch with a welding torch (non-functional) inside
cons: Kids under age 10 may need adult help to assemble
Somewhat pricey for a static build kit

customer_reviews.title: He was super exited to get the set
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 8 year old son who loves Legos. He was super exited to get the set. My kid has autism and Legos seems to be the only toy that keeps his attention. This set was a bit more complicated then your usual Legos, but my son was able to put it all together in two days. He loves that you can twist and turn the knobs and the figure moves it’s head and opens the front “hatch”.
customer_reviews.author: KatushaLA

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING Lego set
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING Lego set. Our 10 yr old loved this. It took him several days over Christmas Break to put together. There were several times he got frustrated and needed to take a break....life lesson. Mind blown the things you can accomplish with Legos...mechanical components too!
customer_reviews.author: Just Janet

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 year old who LOVES legos. He had been asking for it for a while. He finished it much quicker than I thought, so for me it wasn't worth the $100 price tag at all only giving him a few hour challenge, but he loves it so that's what matters. It's got cool features for a lego item with the sides opening to reveal things inside and the head swiveling. Pretty cool, but for me I think it's not worth the price tag and should be bigger and more challenging.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Keller

customer_reviews.title: This is a UCS Lego Model.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this, and very surprised. Even tho the box does not have ultimate collector series, it comes with a stand, and plaque. All the experts are calling it an ultimate collector series BB 8It is to the scale of the ucs R2D2. Very nice set. Only $99.00, price wise not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: LEGO fan
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge LEGO fan, but because LEGO can be pricey, I generally wait for a sale, this set is no exception, cool looking but pricey, it took me about a couple of hours to build this, that included taking care of my kids, I did have one area that Just didn’t want to fit, but all in all a great kit.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: You can make BB8's head bobble, just like in the movie!
customer_reviews.text: The way the head wiggles can be very similar to the movie BB8, it's very unique and very cool. This feature of the kit was pretty surprising, put it over the top for me in an otherwise relatively mundane build. The 'torch door' opens when extending the torch but does not close when the torch is retracted, which seems kinda half-baked to me. The wiggly head more than compensates to me, a pretty great kit overall.
customer_reviews.author: Slabshaft

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to buy this for my Lego fanatic and am highly disappointed in its workmanship. The parts have a hard time staying in place and the top piece doesn't fit properly. My son wants to glue them in place but I'm gonna return it instead because for the amount of money this cost, we shouldn't have to modify it to make it work. Sadly, I wouldn't recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Review from a 41 year old cheap nerd.
customer_reviews.text: The set was great and I had a blast assembling it! I played with the legos as a kid but never actually had a “set.” This is actually only my 2nd LEGO set I have assembled. The instructions were great and very easy to follow and it appeared, they included extra pieces as well. I guess the complaint I have is, it can be completed in a few hours and wasn’t very challenging. I have to take 1 star away, because I paid $32 an hour for the entertainment? I think completely LEGO sets, is a more expensive addiction than a narcotic habit. All being said, it was a blast and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Picks

customer_reviews.title: My 7-year-old grandson bought this with his savings and two weeks of good behavior
customer_reviews.text: This project occupied almost six hours of my grandson's time, uninterrupted. This is the first Lego project - other than the Saturn V which I stowed away for safekeeping - that he has not immediately disassembled and used to create other projects in his imagination. He keeps BB8 on a table in his room, where he looks at it warmly every night.
customer_reviews.author: KCToon

customer_reviews.title: Great set from Lego
customer_reviews.text: Fun set to assemble and nice setup to be displayed. Caught on sale and was worth the money, functional and mpving parts are a nice touch. Definetly recommend
customer_reviews.author: RayRay

customer_reviews.title: Great set for your collection
customer_reviews.text: This set is AMAZING. My ten year old son loves this and spent a few hours building it. He had no issues doing it all by himself. Super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Andie

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous interactive kit from Lego that transforms into the beloved BB8 robot character from the latest films in the Star War series. Although the age range is given as starting at 10, it is still do-able for younger kids (with parental help).
customer_reviews.author: KasaC

customer_reviews.title: BB8 does it again - 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Lego has outdone themselves again. Very good quality product. Priced decently for the amount of legos you get. Product took quite a few hours to build over the course of a few days. Was easy to assemble. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sk8brd

customer_reviews.title: Son Loves It
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my son. He loved it. He built it immediately. The BB-8 has articulating pieces, which he loved. And the little BB-8 that came with it. Easy to build for an 8-year old. He continues to play with this Lego set.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 8-year-old and I had a lot of fun assembling this, and it now sits on his LEGO shelf. Sadly, the stand is slightly too small, so if one lifts it and puts it back down, more often than not the stand prongs will just fall off and need to be put back.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great LEGO set for the family
customer_reviews.text: My 8-year-old nephew, 7-year-old niece, my partner, and I put this together over a short 2-day visit. I'd say we spent about 1.5 – 2 hours on it per day, totaling about 3 – 4 hours. It was really fun, and they were thrilled to show their mom and dad the moving head and the opening/closing torch chamber! Now, it lives in their bedroom as a display piece to commemorate the trip.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Loanes

customer_reviews.title: One of LEGO's cutest creations
customer_reviews.text: It's a hit! Nestled among a host of other LEGO Star Wars items, BB-8 fits in quite nicely. It's bigger than I expected but it's still cute as heck! Not too difficult in assembling either, love the moving parts and information sign. It also has a mini me BB-8 that comes with it! So cute.
customer_reviews.author: RALO_HGTop Contributor: Crochet

customer_reviews.title: BB-8 is way cool!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of fun to put together. The bobbing action of BB-8's head is really cool and cleverly done with the mechanism. He also offers his cutting torch with another mechanism. It comes with a stand that holds him and also a mini-figure BB-8.
customer_reviews.author: P. Wood

customer_reviews.title: What a Cutie!
customer_reviews.text: This guy is a cutie! A good design, but I didn't not like how the front door doesn't close itself after you pull the "thumb's up" torch back in, and adding a rubber band didn't help because of the way the torch arm and door are built.
customer_reviews.author: I am not a number, I am a free man!

customer_reviews.title: Great great great
customer_reviews.text: I loved it from beginning to end! It came as it was offer, and had a great price! Everything LEGO is always a good gift!
customer_reviews.author: Javier Santiago Servent

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad, who began loving legos after retirement, & my husband, who loves Star Wars, to assemble over Thanksgiving. Now my husband and I understand what my dad was saying about legos!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: An okay set for 35% off.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great set but the new starwars movies destroyed the potential value for this set. It doesn’t seem like a UCS set and I only bought it because it was like 36% off retail price. It’s a set most people could do without and probably will.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: ... evenings building the BB-8 and had a lot of fun. Directions were clear and he was able to ...
customer_reviews.text: My 8yo son spent two evenings building the BB-8 and had a lot of fun. Directions were clear and he was able to follow them on his own. The robot is a good size and does not break easily, so it may be one of the few items lasting longer in their original incarnation.
customer_reviews.author: Kalina Koinova

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any BB8 enthusiast! Young or old!
customer_reviews.text: Just finished building this for my son. LEGO can do some amazing feats of engineering in my opinion. It is easy to build, looks great, has added functions. My kiddo is over the moon with it!
customer_reviews.author: megara77

customer_reviews.title: Super cool set
customer_reviews.text: This LEGO set is very neat. The head moves back and forth and spins around. There’s also a little door on the one side of his body that opens up. My son enjoyed putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Widmer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome set! Our 8 year old built it in less than a few hours!! We had bought it for him to do over a weekend with some friends that were keeping him. Didn't last long! He loved the detail!
customer_reviews.author: lindsay w.

customer_reviews.title: So worth it.
customer_reviews.text: My son loved putting this together. It looks amazing. I was really impressed. I feel it was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: trazzle8

customer_reviews.title: This is a great addition to my collection
customer_reviews.text: My parents first date was "A New Hope", so I grew up on Star Wars. This is a great addition to my collection! I love how you can move its head. Move the wheel back and forth quickly, and it looks like a clubbing head nod! So turn on the Cantina song, and let BB-8 rock it out!
customer_reviews.author: Heather H.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: At $80 this was a good deal. At $100, I'd pass. It's not really good for playing.
customer_reviews.author: N. Franke

customer_reviews.title: Very cool. Best Lego set yet for my 11 y/o
customer_reviews.text: Very cool. Best Lego set yet for my 11 y/o, and there's been a bunch of them. It's not motorized but the head is on some kind of flexible stem that allows the head to wobble around when carried; awesome effect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very detailed amazing looking Lego set.
customer_reviews.text: First Lego set I bought for myself in years, and I have to say that I absolutely love it. The amount of detail in this set in utterly fantastic and the features are amazing. Plus, I'm a big fan of BB-8 and Lego sets, so putting them together was a match made in heaven. Recommend for anyone of any age who likes Star Wars and Lego sets.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: It's Lego... It's Star Wars Lego. ...
customer_reviews.text: It's Lego...It's Star Wars Lego....It's BB8!!! What else is there to say. Bought this for our son and months later, he received the same one as a gift from our friends. Now I have one for me. =0)

customer_reviews.title: Loved the project
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8yo grandson and he and his Uncle had a blast putting it together. It was actually missing a part but my daughter called the leggo people and sent the pieces out immediately. Overall fun project and very nice.

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego Set - Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a Great Lego set, and a very nice set to add to the collection.

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun build!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of bang for your buck here. A real solid build and a great way to pass the time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Peters

customer_reviews.title: She was extremely pleased with the large BB-8 LEGOs set and proceeded to ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift for an eleven year old granddaughter who loves all things Star Wars and LEGOs. She was extremely pleased with the large BB-8 LEGOs set and proceeded to promptly assemble it. It's a very nice addition to her LEGOs collection.
customer_reviews.author: Delco Mom-Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love BB-8!!
customer_reviews.text: This LEGO set is so awesome. So much fun to build and I love the little display stand build. Great for kids to build and play with and also great for adults who crave a little bit of creativity in their life.. especially if they are Star Wars fans! The price per piece count can’t be beat either. Highly recommend this set
customer_reviews.author: Cosmo Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Purchase for my daughter, the lego fan. She loved it!! It didn’t take long to build and it has been added to her collection.

customer_reviews.title: The only thing we are missing is a good place to display it
customer_reviews.text: This was a Holiday gift for my 7 year old son. He was able to build most of it by himself over 2 days, and only needed help with a few small pieces. The only thing we are missing is a good place to display it!

customer_reviews.title: Fun build with moving parts
customer_reviews.text: This was bought by my 13 yr old daughter. She put it together in a day but said she enjoyed putting this one together. Its head moves and the "hand" comes out of the side just like in the movie.
customer_reviews.author: PSHORTS

customer_reviews.title: May the force be.with you!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my seven year old. He is exceptional and found this item fun and productive. Held his interest. He got it together in 4 hours.

customer_reviews.title: Like a kid on Christmas morning
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! On Christmas morning my husband's eyes lit up like, well, a kid on Christmas morning. I'm personally not a huge Star Wars fan, but even I think this turned out really well and looks great! Now I just need to get him to take it to work so it isn't sitting on the mantle in our living room. ;-)

customer_reviews.title: Great

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product. I LOVE how the rubber band design ...
customer_reviews.text: It's LEGO. What can I say? It's a great product. I LOVE how the rubber band design (hidden inside) makes BB8's head move around JUST like it does in the movies. Nice engineering!

product_meta.title: LEGO Star Wars VIII BB-8 75187 Building Kit (1106 Piece)
product_meta.description: This faithfully reproduced LEGO Star Wars incarnation of the diminutive BB-8 droid from the new Star Wars movie trilogy makes the perfect gift for any Star Wars or LEGO fan. Turn one wheel at the side to rotate the detailed head, and another to open the access hatch and extend the 'welding torch'. This faithfully reproduced model also comes with a display stand, decorative fact plaque and small BB-8 figure, making it a great display piece for any bedroom or office.
feature_bullets: Features authentic detailing, and wheel activated rotating head and opening hatch with non functioning welding torch
Also includes a display stand, decorative fact plaque and a small BB 8 figure
B8 without stand measures over 9inch (25centimeter) high and 5inch (15centimeter) wide
